reviewText: man, this was a doozy of a dvd. pioneer animation comes through yet again with another beautiful dvd.  nice crisp video and great sound only add to the appeal of the series. tate's plan to destroy humanity is reaching its  climax in this dvd and it is up to kyoji and co. to stop them. for those  who are following this series, eps 7-9 are definately on par with the  exciting episode 6 on the second dvd.  not wanting to give away what  happens here, but i must say that it left me wanting more and my hopes are  high for the 4th dvd
